page.title: 08Barton Services
page.content: Barton has on its doorstep the facility of some necessary services.There is the Fire Station in Short Lane which is run by part-time Firemen, who when needed, are summoned to the station by electronic bleepers which they carry with them at all times.The station is equipped with a Fire Engine and a practice tower.Also in Short Lane is the Cottage Hospital catering mainly for short stay patients which are normally the elderly or convalescents. A stones throw from the hospital is the Health Centre where 3 Doctors,Family Planning clinics,Baby Welfare clinics, the Physiotherapist and the Mobile School Dentist may all be consulted.A Police Station is situated in Efflinch Lane and is run by a Sergeant and 7 Police Constables.The station is open from 8 am until 2 am.The Policemen are friendly and enjoy working in Barton.
